name: Mondelez International, Inc.
summary: Mondelez International, Inc. is a leading American multinational company specializing in confectionery, food, beverage, and snack products. Headquartered in Chicago, it operates in over 160 countries and owns iconic brands such as Oreo, Cadbury, Milka, Ritz, and Trident. The company was formed in 2012 following a demerger from Kraft Foods and is publicly traded on NASDAQ under the ticker MDLZ.
